value.title: Clean, transform, and load data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to clean, transform, and load data in Power BI.

value.title: Explore data in Power BI
value.excerpt: Turn your business intelligence data into data insights by creating and configuring Power BI dashboards.

value.title: Optimize a model forÂ performanceÂ in Power BIÂ
value.excerpt: Data Analysis eXpression (DAX) language is a key feature of Power BI. It is used to create calculated columns, calculated tables, and measures. In this module, you will learn how to use DAX to solve typical analytics problems. You will learn about one of the most popular DAX functions, CALCULATE, and how it can override the default behavior of Power BI.

value.title: Publish and share in Power BI
value.excerpt: Publish and share your Power BI reports and dashboards to teammates in your organization or to everyone on the web.

value.title: A cleaner way to import files from a  SharePoint folder with a Power Query function
value.excerpt: Import files from SharePoint folder with Power Query into Power BI In today's video, I am going to show you how to import files that are stored in a SharePoint folder or library in Power BI using Power Query.   To do that we will create a function that cleans a typical file and then reuse that function

value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.  Processing Options:  https://docs.microsoft.com/analysis-services/multidimensional-models/processing-options-and-settings-analysis-services?view=asallproducts-allversions

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Dynamically Filter By Today's Date
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to dynamically filter by today's date. Using a date table, you can create a DAX measure that can then be used as a Power BI report-level filter to dynamically filter by today's date within Power BI Desktop.be  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com
